title: Regulating oxygen vacancies and coordination environment of manganese dioxide for enhanced high-mass-loading energy storage
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,3384-3395
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00949E, Paper
Zhongyou Peng, Yuting Huang, Alexander G. Bannov, Shulong Li, Ling Tang, Licheng Tan, Yiwang Chen
This work presents a conceptual strategy that the optimized Mn coordination environment with oxygen vacancy could induce a local built-in electric field and additional active sites, achieving excellent ionic-transport and pseudocapacitive capacity.
